Posts.Content: Leisa1968 wrote: I just went for my 6 mo f/u blood work and x-rays for my oncologist visit which is scheduled on the 19th.Â  The radiology tech asked me after my chest x-ray if I had any "clips" from my double masectomy and/or reconstruction surgery.... I told her that I had just had my exchange surgery on the 3rd of December, but I was not aware of clips left behind. I called my plastic surgeon's office and asked if seeing "clips" after surgery was common (could it be stitches still dissolving, etc), and the nurse said no, but she would check with the dr. and get back with me.... I am still waiting for the call, I'm just freaking out.... I am ready to be done with everything (just have my nips and tatoos left)... and now this!!!!! Leisa Dx 3/27/2008, IDC, 2cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 2/11 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Something left behind in surgery? Leisa1968 AlwaysHope
